email_subtitle: Set up your own identity so customers recognize your emails.
email_step_1: Go to sendgrid.com and create a free account.
email_step_2: In the settings panel, look for API Keys and create a new one with full access.
email_step_3: Paste the generated key in the box on the left.
email_step_4: Verify your Domain in the 'Sender Authentication' section of SendGrid to avoid SPAM.
email_info_card: By using your own connection, MercaFlow will not charge you for the emails sent. Your customers will receive messages from your own domain, increasing trust.
